parameters:
Oops, this road is closed. You'll need to pay a toll if you
want to pass.

It's 140,000 for one person, so for two people, you'll need
a total of 280,000 jewels.

You must be some villain who's made this place your lair,
extorting outrageous prices from people!! I'll take you
down!!

No, this amount has been calculated according to the rules
of this island... here is the certificate.

Ah, this is a real certificate. It doesn't seem to be a
fake.

There is a legend that the dungeon ahead contains treasures
far greater than any other dungeon.

Therefore, it's managed so that not just anyone can attempt
it.
How are we supposed to come up with 280,000 jewels...

There are smaller dungeons on this island that have turned
into places to explore. You might be able to make some money
if you search there.

Or since you two are young, you could work in the city of
Cochinukashi and earn it quickly... no, my apologies.

Anyway, as long as you two can pay the 280,000 jewels, we
can grant you passage.
Please try your best by whatever means you like. Farewell.
You can now spin the gacha at the guild on the first island!
Indeed, I have received the toll. Please go ahead.

Rumor has it that the treasure in the dungeon ahead is more
incredible than any other... It's said that you can obtain
whatever outcome you desire.
Good luck. I wish you fortune.

Obtain whatever outcome I desire!? This could be an amazing
treasure...!!

Rumor has it that the treasure in the dungeon ahead is more
amazing than any other... It's said that you can obtain
whatever outcome you desire.
Please do your best. I wish you luck.
